Doc: A type defining the parameters used in the calculation of fixed or floating rate calculation period amounts or for specifying a known calculation period amount or known amount schedule.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type defining the parameters used in the calculation of fixed or floating rate calculation period amounts or for specifying a known calculation period amount or known amount schedule.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.CalculationPeriodAmount {
  # The parameters used in the calculation of fixed or floaring rate calculation period amounts.
  calculation : FpML5.confirmation.Calculation

  # The known calculation period amount or a known amount schedule expressed as explicit known amounts and dates. In the case of a schedule, the step dates may be subject to adjustment in accordance with any adjustments specified in calculationPeriodDatesAdjustments.
  knownAmountSchedule : FpML5.confirmation.AmountSchedule

}

calculation.Doc: The parameters used in the calculation of fixed or floaring rate calculation period amounts.
calculation.Name: calculation

knownAmountSchedule.Doc: The known calculation period amount or a known amount schedule expressed as explicit known amounts and dates. In the case of a schedule, the step dates may be subject to adjustment in accordance with any adjustments specified in calculationPeriodDatesAdjustments.
knownAmountSchedule.Name: knownAmountSchedule
